description:
Explore and navigate the world with confidence using Google Maps. Find the best routes with live traffic data and real-time GPS navigation for driving, walking, cycling and public transport. Discover over 250 million businesses and places – from restaurants and shops to everyday essentials – with photos, reviews and helpful information.

Navigate the world, the way that you want:
• Get to where you need to go with fuel-efficient route options
• Find the best route with real-time, turn-by-turn voice and on-screen navigation
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Catch the bus, train and ride-share effortlessly, with real-time updates
• Find bike or scooter rentals to get around more easily

Plan trips and experiences effortlessly:
• Preview an area before you go (e.g. parking, entrances) with Street View
• Use Immersive View to experience what landmarks, parks and routes look like, and even check the weather so that you can be ready in advance
• Create custom lists of your favourite saved places and share with others
• Order delivery and takeaway, make reservations and book hotels
• Don't get lost with offline maps in an area with bad signal
• Search for local places and things to do, and decide based on user reviews and photos

Discover and explore like a local:
• Explore with confidence knowing 500 million users contribute and keep the map up to date each year
• Avoid the crowds by seeing how busy a place is before you get there
• Use Lens in Maps to see walking directions overlaid on the real world
• Filter restaurants by cuisine, hours, price, rating and more
• Ask questions about a place, from dishes to parking, and get quick answers

Some features not available in all countries or cities
Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

Discover the freedom to explore any location virtually with Location Emulator. Whether you're planning a trip, testing location-based apps, or simply having fun, this app provides a seamless and immersive experience. With a variety of powerful features, Location Emulator puts you in control of your virtual movements.

 Key Features:


1. Multiple Location Set
Save and manage your favorite spots with detailed location markers. Customize each location with a name, photo, and timestamp. Effortlessly organize your locations for easy access anytime.

2. Custom Location
Manually set your desired location on the map. Search and select locations or enter coordinates. Edit and attach personalized images to your locations.

3. Schedule Movement
Plan your virtual movements in advance. Set schedules to automatically change your location at specified times. Create, preview, and manage your schedule with ease.

4. Favorites & History
Save frequently used locations as favorites for quick access. View your location history to revisit past places. Keep track of your virtual travels effortlessly.

5. Joystick Control
Navigate in real-time with an intuitive on-screen joystick. Adjust your virtual position smoothly and accurately. Experience a realistic movement simulation.

6. Smart Routes
Generate dynamic paths between locations. Simulate travel using intelligent route options. Customize the speed and duration of your journey.

7. Travel Photo Mode
Explore popular tourist destinations virtually. Set your location to famous landmarks and capture amazing travel photos. Enhance your photo collection with virtual trips.

8. 3D Map Experience
Immerse yourself in a detailed 3D map view. Explore landmarks and surroundings from every angle. Get a realistic visual experience while navigating.

9. Live Traffic Map
Stay informed with real-time traffic updates. Visualize road conditions and optimize your virtual routes. Enhance your simulated journeys with accurate traffic data.

Privacy Policy : https://gpsemulatorgpstracker.blogspot.com/2025/03/privacy-policy-for-gps-emulator-gps.html
Terms Condition : https://gpsemulatorgpstracker.blogspot.com/2025/03/terms-conditions-for-gps-emulator-gps.html
EULA : https://gpsemulatorgpstracker.blogspot.com/2025/03/end-user-license-agreement-eula-of-gps.html

Know what's ahead on the road with the help from other drivers. Waze is a live map that harnesses the local knowledge of tens of millions of drivers around the world. Drivers safely and confidently reach their everyday destinations thanks to Waze map’s GPS navigation, live traffic updates, real-time safety alerts (including roadworks, accidents, crashes, police, potholes and more) and accurate ETAs.


Make your next drive more predictable and stress-free:
• Get there faster with real-time directions, accurate ETAs and automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Even if you know the way, avoid surprises on the road ahead with safety alerts for accidents, crashes, roadworks, objects on the road, potholes, speed bumps, sharp curves, bad weather, emergency vehicles, railway crossings and more
• Steer clear of tickets by knowing where police and red light and speed cameras are located
• Share what’s happening on the road with other drivers by reporting live incidents and hazards
• Stay informed of upcoming speed limit changes, and keep your speedometer in check
• Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance
• See toll pricing and choose to avoid tolls along your routes
• Add road passes and vignettes for HOV lanes and restricted traffic zones
• Find petrol/fuel stations and prices and EV charging stations along your route
• Locate car parks near your destination
• Use voice-guided turn-by-turn navigation from a variety of languages, local accents and your favourite celebrities
• Plan your next drive by checking ETAs by future departure or arrival times
• Use your favourite audio apps (for podcasts, music, news, audiobooks) directly within Waze
• Sync Waze to your car’s built-in display through Apple CarPlay


* Some features are not available in all countries


* Waze navigation is not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles


You can manage your in-app Waze privacy settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

ALLEZ PARTOUT 
Réservez un trajet  pour que le chauffeur le plus proche de votre localisation vous prenne en charge. Nos pilotes vous emmènent où vous voulez en favorisant un environnement de trajet agréable et courtois. Planifiez des prises en charge pour plus tard avec des types de voitures abordables et confortables - y compris de ville à ville.  
Explorez nos services de transport: Basic | Confort | Luxe | Junior.  
 
MANGEZ TOUT 
Faites livrer vos restaurants préférés à temps et directement à votre porte. Personnalisez votre commande à votre convenance et suivez la livraison de votre commande en temps réel puis  découvrez les meilleurs restaurants près de chez vous de la ville avec Klic Food.  
 Avec Klic Food, vous pouvez éviter les frais de livraison sur la nourriture et profiter de réductions spéciales sur les repas au restaurant. 
 
OBTENEZ N’IMPORTE QUOI 
Faites-vous livrer vos courses supermarché et épicerie en un clin d’œil avec Klic supermarché et profitez de larges économies sur les livraisons. Commandez en ligne et faites livrer vos courses directement à votre porte dans les 30 minutes qui suivent. De plus, vos  livraisons d’épicerie sont gratuites ! Klic  livre des aliments frais, de l’alcool et des articles ménagers partout à Lomé. Téléchargez l’application pour voir quels magasins sont disponibles dans votre zone. Vous préférez ramasser? Commandez en ligne et ramassez à votre magasin local après que votre assistant personnel ait rempli votre panier et attend votre arrivée.

Locato is a powerful and reliable GPS phone tracker that allows you to track and locate your loved ones in real-time. With Locato, you can ensure the safety of your family and friends by knowing their exact whereabouts at all times. Our app provides real-time location updates, comprehensive location history, and smart geo-fence notifications to keep you connected with those who matter most.

Key Features:

Real-Time Location Tracking: Know the current location of your loved ones on a live map.
Accurate GPS Tracking: Find the exact location of your family members and friends in real-time.
Location History: Access past location data to see where they've been.
Geofence Zones: Set up geofence zones to receive notifications when someone enters or leaves a specific area.
Device Tracking: Find lost or stolen phones using another family member's registered device.
Place Alerts: Get notified when family members arrive or leave specific locations like home or school.
Privacy and Consent: Location sharing is only possible with mutual consent to ensure privacy.
How It Works:

Add your family members' phone numbers to the app.
They accept the invite and share their location.
Track their location on the map in real-time.
Why Locato?

Easy Setup: Simply add your loved ones by their phone number and start tracking.
Peace of Mind: Ensure your family members are safe at all times.
Lost Phone Recovery: Track your lost or stolen phone using the app.
Please note that continuous use of location services can decrease battery life.

Subscription Information:
Locato offers a premium subscription plan with additional features, including unlimited location alerts, extended location history, and an ad-free experience. Subscription plans are available on a weekly, monthly, and yearly basis. Payment will be charged to your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in your account settings.

By using Locato, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
Privacy Policy: https://reidxsoft.com/locato/gizlilik.html
Terms of Use: https://reidxsoft.com/locato/kullanim.html

developer: DIRECT CURSUS COMPUTER SYSTEMS TRADING LLC
description:
Search for an address or the best places nearby both online and offline. Yandex Maps provides information about organizations and helps you reach your destination by car, public transport, bike, or on foot based on current traffic conditions.

Search for and select locations:
• The largest organization database and filters to refine your search.
• Detailed information: contacts, hours of operation, services provided, photos, and reviews.
• Floor plans to find your way around Moscow's major shopping malls.
• Search for places and addresses without an internet connection (offline maps).
• View places saved on your smartphone, tablet, and PC.

Custom map settings:
• Real-time location of buses, trams, trolleybuses, and minibuses.
• Road maps that show current traffic conditions in the city.
• Parking layer with the location and cost of official parking.
• Street panoramas for a road-side view of any address.
• Choose from three map types: Roadmap, Satellite, and Hybrid.

Public transport, car, bike, and walking routes:
• Pedestrian navigation: paths between buildings, through parks, across squares, and other pedestrian zones.
• Bike navigation: road types, underpass and overpass preferences, and highway warnings.
• Public transport routes with timetables and estimated time of arrival.
• Optimal driving routes based on live traffic conditions and driving options.
• Step-by-step instructions with voice navigation.
• Speed camera, speed limit, and speeding notifications.
• Real-time updates on traffic, road accidents, speed radar, and more.

Offline maps:
• Driving routes and voice navigation.
• Downloadable lightweight maps (minimum storage space, for example, the Moscow map is just 187 MB).
• Database of organizations with hours of operation, services provided, and more.
• Over 2000 cities in Russia, Armenia, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Turkey, Ukraine, and Estonia.

Information from users:
• Mark road events on the map and comment on user submissions.
• Regular updates to the Public Map keep you informed about your city.
• Write reviews, upload photos, and update information about organizations.

Yandex Maps has an Apple Watch app. Use it to:
• Navigate the map.
• View the nearest metro station and public transport stops.
• Find out when public transport will arrive at a nearby stop.
• Track traffic patterns a few hours ahead of time.
• View weather forecasts.

Terms of Use: apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeula
Privacy Policy: yandex.com/legal/confidential

Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transport rides!

Dailymail - "This travel app is a godsend for anyone using public transport – with live updates to bus schedules, as well as a great route-planner for cities across the UK."

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway/underground /tube, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use bikes, ride-sharing like Uber, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and live arrival times with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike or a combination of them. 
This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year 2017 by the App Store!

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3200 cities throughout the world.

► Journey Planner that combines you all transport options and gives you the best route with live arrivals.

► Live Directions: Get step-by-step directions with live guidance as you travel: know exactly how long you need to walk to your station, how long you’re waiting, view the arrival time of your line and how many stops are left. 

► Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains.

► Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction and more...

► Users reports. Moovit’s users report issues found with stations, line service, and timetables so that we can inform all nearby riders about what’s going on in their area.

► Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus or train time is impacted!

► Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. 
Bike docking stations are updated in real-time.

► Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you’re offline, or underground on the subway. 

Ride with Moovit in all major cities:

UK:
• London
• Manchester
• Birmingham
• Leeds
• Edinburgh
• Glasgow
• Liverpool
• Sheffield

Ireland:
• Dublin and all of the Republic of Ireland. 

Moovit supports all major transit:

UK:
• TFL - Bus, Tube, DLR, Overground, Ferry (River Bus), Tfl Rail, Tram, Coach
• National Express
• National Rail
• Arriva
• First
• Stagecoach and more...

Ireland:
• Bus Eireann
• Dublin Bus
• Irish Rail
• Luas
• Kenneally’s Bus Service and more…

Bike sharing provided by:
• Santander Cycles in London
• BelfastBikes in Belfast
• Bike in Bath
• Nextbike in Glasgow

India:
•Delhi: Delhi Metro (DMRC), Delhi Buses (DTC), Northern Railways (NR)
•Mumbai: Mumbai Metro (M.M.R.D.A), all buses: BEST, NMMT, KDMT, VVMT, MBMT, KMT, TMT, Ferries and more
•Bangalore: Namma Metro, B.M.T.C (buses and metro feeder routes), South Western Railways
•Chennai: Chennai Metro Rail, all buses - Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTA)
•Ahmedabad: A.M.T.S, Bus Rapid Transport System (BRTS), V.T.C.O.S 
•Pune: Indian Railways, Pune Local Central Railways, Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahaman.

Singapore:
• MRT, LRT, bus, tram, cable car & shuttle buses. Service provided by:
• SBS
• SMRT
• Tower Transit
• Go-Ahead Singapore

You ride, we guide!

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new
moovit@Facebook, Twitter

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en

developer: CEBINDEKI PAZAR E-TICARET ALISVERIS HIZMETLERI SANAYI VE TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
description:
Location: Your Comprehensive Location and Orientation Companion

Discover the power of myLocation, a user-friendly tool designed to simplify location search and sharing. With just a few screen clicks, effortlessly navigate between your current and specified locations. Need to uncover the coordinates or address of your current spot? Look no further than iLocation.

Whether you have an important appointment to explain or find yourself in need of your current whereabouts, myLocation has you covered. Simply pin your desired location on the map and effortlessly select your preferred transportation method to share it with others.

Key Features at a Glance:

Instant display of current location information upon app launch
Detailed coordinates and altitude display for your current or specified position
Seamlessly view the address of any location
Stay on track with the built-in Altimater bearing feature
Customize your map view with the option to switch between General and Satellite formats
Set the map's center, allowing you to easily check coordinates and addresses
Enter coordinates directly for precise location selection
Input an address of your choice to designate an arbitrary location (Pro feature)
Save maps directly to your camera roll or clipboard
Create a personal list of favorite locations for quick access
Preserve and share specific location information and maps via various social media platforms
Share locations instantly with a unique URL, ensuring immediate connectivity for recipients
With myLocation, no words are necessary to convey your whereabouts. Let the app speak for you, providing accurate location details effortlessly.

Experience the power of Location GPS, a versatile application for determining geographical orientation. This feature-packed tool goes beyond a traditional, offering an array of data displays such as altitude, longitude, latitude, weather information, water boiling point, air data, magnetic field data, and more.

Discover Key Features:

Immerse yourself in a highly accurate elevation experience
Gain valuable insights into longitude, latitude, altitude, and real-time weather updates
Conveniently record and save your important locations for future reference
Harness the real-time GPS velocity measurement feature for precise speed tracking
Unlock Limitless Access with Subscriptions:

Access an expanded range of GEO data
Leverage accurate GPS speed measurement capabilities
Enjoy an ad-free user experience
Gain unlimited access to all app features through a subscription
Choose from monthly or yearly subscription plans based on your needs
Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase

It is at your service with its unlimited features.

• Choosing a location (Free)
• View location coordinate (Free)
• Save location information (Free)
• Add and change profile picture (Free)
• Sharing location (Pro)

Pro Version!

To get even more out of ILocation- subscribe to the Pro Version (Unlock all share and remove ads).

Subscription Pricing and Terms

Pro Version is only $6,49/month. Pricing in other countries may vary and charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country you live in.

The Pro Version subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go into your iTunes user account settings to manage your auto-renew and subscription settings.

Visit the site for Terms and Conditions.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

GPS Emulator Location and Navigation is your all-in-one navigation and utility app, designed to make travel simple, smart, and efficient. Whether you're exploring new cities or commuting daily, GPS Emulator Location offers powerful tools to assist every step of the way.

Key Features:

Search Routes – Get accurate and optimized route suggestions.

Voice Navigation – Hands-free, turn-by-turn directions for safe travel.

Nearby Places – Instantly find restaurants, ATMs, gas stations, and more.

Currency Converter – Convert currencies in real time for global travel.

Fuel Converter – Calculate fuel consumption and costs across units.

WiFi Map Direction – Navigate using WiFi-based mapping when offline.

Compass – Stay oriented with an accurate digital compass.

Translator – Communicate easily with built-in language translation.

GPS Emulator Location combines essential travel tools into one easy-to-use app. Whether you're on a road trip or in a foreign country, GPS Emulator Location keeps you informed, connected, and on the right path.

Download now and navigate smarter with GPS Emulator Location.

SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS:

You may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through an In-App Purchase to enjoy all App Features without Ads:

• Auto-renewable subscription

• Weekly, 1 month and 1-year durations

• Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

• Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

* Link to Privacy Policy: https://gpsmla.blogspot.com/2025/07/privacy-policy.html

* Link to Terms of use: https://gpsmla.blogspot.com/2025/07/terms-conditions.html

* Link to EULA: https://gpsmla.blogspot.com/2025/07/end-user-license-agreement-agreement.html

Get your current GPS coordinates even faster!

   • Pinpoint Precision with High Accuracy GPS: Discover your exact coordinates, altitude, GPS precision, and satellite count, ensuring you're always on the m
   • Flexible Coordinate Formats: Tailor your experience with multiple latitude and longitude formats (DD decimal degrees, DDM degrees and decimal minutes, DMS degrees, minutes and seconds sexagesimal , UTM Universal Transverse Mercator, MGRS Military Grid Reference System) to suit your needs.
   • Snapshot Memories: Capture the moment and location with a photo, complete with all GPS details artistically displayed.
   • Personalize Your Memories: Customize your Geo-tagged photos by adjusting the position, color, and size of the location data overlay.
   • Bookmark Your Adventures: Save any location with the option to attach a photo, perfect for revisiting those special spots.
   • Distance Units of Your Choice: Whether you prefer metric or imperial, choose the unit that makes sense for you.
   • Unmatched Location Accuracy: Rely on the app’s superior accuracy to pinpoint your exact position.
   • Map View of Saved Locations: Visualize all your saved spots on a user-friendly map interface.
   • Effortless Location Search: Easily find locations by address – simplicity at its best.
   • Instant Location Sharing: Share your current whereabouts quickly and effortlessly.
   • Organized Memories: Filter your saved locations by date, distance, or keywords for easy access.
   • In-App Learning Hub: Get to know the app better with the helpful in-app guidance function.
   • Compass Navigation to Saved Spots: Let the built-in compass guide you back to your saved locations.
   • Versatile Data Export and Import: Use GPX, KML, or the custom MYGPS format for comprehensive data management, including photos.
   • Lifesaving SOS Feature: Send an SOS message with your coordinates in emergencies, customizable with a preset number and message.
   • Customizable Sorting Options: Sort your saved locations by name, date, or proximity to your current position.
   • Adjustable Location Accuracy Mode: Choose your desired balance between precision and battery consumption.
   • Seamless Watch Integration: Save locations using your Apple Watch and sync seamlessly with your phone.
   • Diverse Map Choices: Switch between normal, terrain, hybrid, and satellite maps for diverse viewing options.

Our app comes with a application for Apple Watch devices. You can easily save your current location without using your phone and synchronize data afterwards to enjoy viewing your saved locations on a bigger screen!

Internet connection is not needed but it's helpful to get better accuracy.
Get your current GPS coordinates even faster!

Data is based on WGS84.

Disclaimer:
Accuracy depends on the quality of GPS hardware in your device as well as outside weather conditions. Be aware that GPS does not work well indoors, so try to use it outside most of the time. It is extremely important because trying to get coordinates at home might be difficult.Get your current GPS coordinates even faster!

Privacy policy: https://mysticmobileapps.com/legal/privacy/mygpscoordinates
Terms and conditions: https://mysticmobileapps.com/legal/terms/mygpscoordinates

2GIS makes life in the city more comfortable! Map, navigator, public transport, guidebook and directory – all one icon away in your phone. It will show your location, find a required address, help you to plot your route by car, bus, bicycle or by foot. And then you can see your friends right on the map in 2GIS!

The app is free and it works both online and offline – just download the required city or even a region and use maps without Internet connection.

GPS navigation. Get ready to see precisely depicted roads with tunnels and multi-level junctions in 3D. 2GIS will build an optimal route providing for traffic jam, road accidents and roads under construction. It will show your speed so that you don’t have to glance at speed meter too often. It will give you a warning of speed and other cameras ahead so that you can avoid getting a ticket. It will show you the nearest parking lots. The app combines different technologies to make route following more precise, even on long-distance travels without Internet connection. Turn on 2GIS in Apple CarPlay — it’s free.

Maps maxed out. 2GIS is detailed maps of more than 1400 cities: with realistic models of buildings, neighborhoods, roads, bus stops – even trees in a park and entrances to buildings are shown! Floor-by-floor layouts are available for malls, train and bus stations, airports and other complex buildings – you will not get lost! As well as layers with real estate, car sharing and other useful services.

Public transport. Build routes by subway, bus, trolley or commuter train. Choose the shortest ones or the most convenient ones, with or without change of transport. Turn on bus tracking on the map in real time. Go by the schedule and see credible estimated time of bus arrival to your bus stop.

Navigator for pedestrians, bicycles and scooters. 2GIS can build routes through a city providing for inclinations and elevations, cycle lanes and stairs. It is particularly convenient for scooter riders or people walking with strollers. 

Friends on the Map. Add your friends and family members as Friends in 2GIS to see each other on the map in the city in real time! No need to ask, “Where are you?”, just check location on the map. It makes meeting planning easier (especially if someone is running late) or allows for spontaneous meetings! Send an emoji to a friend to offer a meeting or start conversation in chat without a need to switch to a messenger.

You can also send a link to your location or route to any person, not just friends. And even create temporary groups for travels. Manage who can see your location. It is convenient, private and helps you to always stay in touch.

This function may be used as a family location finder: add your child or grandmother and grandfather to Friends and you will not have to worry if they don’t respond in a messenger. You will get an automatic push notification when your relative is at home.

Everything about the city. In 2GIS search, you will find contact details of companies and organizations, addresses, business hours, restaurant menus, information on products and services, and even pictures with prices. All information is updated regularly.

Reviews. 2GIS not only helps you to find companies, products and services, but also to choose the best of the best! The app stores tens of thousands of reviews, real photos from customers and honest rating of a place.

Guidebooks. Discover interesting places just for you in any city! Includes original selections, audio guides and sightseeing attractions in 3D.

Navigator for trucks. Cargo navigator gets directions for trucks considering the individual characteristics of vehicles and cargo.

The Apple Watch companion app conveys a map and a route created using your phone on your watch screen, and also shows your current location. Vibration will alert you when you need to turn. The Friends on the map widget on the main screen will keep you informed of your loved ones' whereabouts. 

Support: dev@2gis.com
GoChap , l'unique solution qu'il vous faut pour vous déplacer , livrer un colis , acheter a manger , faire du shopping et faire les bons deals

Transit is your real-time urban travel companion. Open the app to instantly see accurate next departure times, check and track buses, and trains near you on the map, and see upcoming transit schedules. Use the trip planner to quickly compare trips, including bus, ferry, bike, metro or rail, and subway options. Get alerted about service disruptions and delays for your favorite lines, and save frequently used locations for trip directions in a tap. 

HERE’S WHAT THEY’RE SAYING
"Gives you the best route to where you want to go" - New York Times
“You won't realize how much time you can save planning until you use this app” - LA Times
“Killer app” - Wall Street Journal
"MBTA has a favorite transit app — and it's called Transit" - Boston Globe
“A one-stop-shop” - Washington Post

AND HERE’S THE WORD FROM PUBLIC TRANSIT RIDERS
“Your app was the deciding factor in selling my car.”
“Blows Google Maps out of the water.”
“The head of our local transit agency recommended this app over the one her agency created.”

5 GREAT THINGS ABOUT TRANSIT:

1) THE BEST REAL-TIME DATA
Using the best transit agency data sources, and our fancy ETA prediction engine, we give you the most accurate real-time info possible for all transit modes -  including buses, subways, trains, streetcars, metros, ferries, ridehail and more. Prefer to travel on two wheels? With GPS, you can see live bikeshare and scooter locations right on the map. 

2) TRAVEL OFFLINE
Bus schedules, stop locations, subway maps and even our trip planner are available offline.

3) POWERFUL TRIP PLANNING
See fast and easy trips combining buses, subways and trains – the app even suggests routes that combine multiple options in one trip like bus + bike or scooter + metro. You’ll find great trip plans that you never even considered! Don’t like to walk a lot or use a certain mode or transit agency? Personalize your travel in the settings.  

4) GO: OUR STEP-BY-STEP NAVIGATOR*
Receive departure alarms to catch your bus or train, and get alerted when it’s time to get off or transfer. When using GO, you’ll also crowdsource more accurate info and real-time ETAs for other passengers– and rack up points and thank yous for being the most helpful rider on your line.  

5) USER REPORTS
See what other riders have to say! With millions of users contributing, you’ll get helpful info on crowding levels, on-time performance, the closest subway exits, and more.

*continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

900+ CITIES INCLUDING:
London, Manchester, Birmingham, Leeds, Glasgow, Liverpool, Edinburgh, Bristol, Nottingham, Newcastle upon Tyne, Sheffield, Brighton, Southampton, Leicester, Reading, Belfast, Portsmouth, Bournemouth, Blackpool, Milton Keynes, Sunderland, Hull, York, Ipswich, Guildford, Chichester, Aylesbury, Warrington, Crawley, Devon, Essex, Norfolk, Keighley, Penzance, Falmouth, Doncaster, Chippenham, Carlisle, Harrogate, Honley, Gloucester

AND ALSO CITIES ACROSS THE WORLD:
Paris, Barcelona, Berlin, Brussels, Bristol, Calgary, Dubai, Dublin, Chicago, Edinburgh, Edmonton, Los Angeles, Melbourne, Milan, Montreal, New York City, Madrid, Auckland, Quebec City, Rome, Sydney, Toronto, Vancouver, Victoria, Washington D.C.

"One of the better GPS apps for sporting enthusiasts for the iPhone..."
- Bryan Wolfe, AppAdvice.com

Do you want to track your hiking, biking, walking, running?
Do you want to track your outdoor activities?
Do you need to navigate to waypoints?   
Do you want to store your favorite destinations?

GPS Tracks is an ideal app for your outdoor navigational needs, it makes navigating to a specific point and tracking your outdoor activities very simple.  It will keep track of your activities and allow you to easliy navigate to coordinates.

Use Applications -
• Great for hiking offline, running, walking, and biking to track your route!
• Great for photographers who need to track location data for their pictures!
• Great for hunters and fishermen who need to store specific locations!
• Great for golfing to find the distance to the pin!
• Great for military navigational applications!

Features

Live Activities & Widgets
• Live Activity for tracking
• Live Activity for navigating to waypoints
• Lock Screen & Home Screen widget for distance today
• Lock Screen & Home Screen widget for current location
• Home Screen widget for last track and add new waypoint

Track
• Track your location/route of your activity
• Store favorite locations
• Take GPS static observations to average current location for more accurate waypoints
• Easily navigate to waypoints with the waypoint guide on the compass
• Add fully editable waypoints on the fly to your current track either manually or from you favorite locations
• Add a vector as a waypoint with angle and distance
• Convert between four sets of coordinates (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) anytime
• Glide Ratio is viewable and tracked during recording
• Use degrees or mils for the compass
• Add MGRS Grid overlay to map
• Create routes to follow manually before you start your track
• GPS Tracks uses WGS84 datum, over 220 datums available with an In-App purchase.

Measure
• Map measuring tools allow you to measure area and distance on the map
• Draw or drop pins to measure

Apple Watch App
• Track your activity directly with your Apple Watch without your iPhone
• Will save your workouts to the Health app from the watch (only the watch app uses HealthKit)

Connect
• iCloud syncing (will sync between Mac, iPad, and iPhone version)
• Import/Export to Dropbox, iCloud Drive, or iTunes File Sharing
• Send locations to the Navigon/TomTom/Google app or the default Maps app for driving directions
• Share your location with friends with a text message (SMS) or email with a direct link to your location on a map
• Import and export tracks/coordinates in a GPX, KML, BIN, CSV, or NMEA format
• Email exported files
• Export track with photos to KMZ file to export your photos taken during the track

Review History
• View your track on the map with the ability to replay the route
• View detailed statistics of the track
• View the waypoints saved with each track
• Change track color

There are many other great features.

GPS Tracks Pro & Premium (Auto-Renewing Yearly Subscription In-App Purchase)
• Use Street, Terrain, Satellite, USGS, NOAA nautical charts, FAA charts, and many other alternate map sources
• Save maps for offline use
• Add map overlays of local trails or area boundaries from images, files, or directly from your camera
• Use custom Map Tile Server URLs
• Print Maps in PDF
• GPS Tracks Live - location sharing with friends which allows you to see your friends tracks live on the map
• Weather at waypoints
• Elevation profiles for tracks
• Subscription syncs via iCloud to other devices

Île-de-France Mobilités is here to assist you daily. Purchase a digital ticket, recharge your Navigo pass, search for routes including trains, RERs, metros, trams, buses, coaches, bicycles, Vélib', car-sharing, or car rentals. Find schedules in real-time or traffic information... Discover essential tools and information for organizing your travels in Île-de-France. Together, let's travel with ease.

Avoid queues at stations: buy your transport tickets from your iPhone!
The following tickets are available for purchase:

- Metro-Train tickets or Bus-Tram Ticket
- One Way from/to Airports (you cannot purchase this ticket if you already have a Metro-Train Ticket charged on your device)
- Navigo daily (this fare doesn’t permit you to go to airports), weekly, or monthly passes
- Special fares (Anti-pollution pass, Paris-Visit Passes etc.)
- Daily Vélib’ passes

Purchased tickets can then be (depending on the chosen purchasing path):

- Stored on the iPhone and validated directly at stations (from iPhone Xr and iOS 17.5)
- Loaded onto your Navigo pass (from an iPhone 7, with at least iOS 13. iPhone XR and XS are compatible starting from iOS 14.5)

For compatible tickets (Metro-Train and Bus-Tram Tickets, Navigo Day passes, special fares), no account is needed, and you can pay directly with Apple Pay!

You can prepare and plan your travels:

- Find nearby bus stops, train stations, and metro stations
- Search for real-time public transport routes, car-sharing, and bicycle routes
- Save upcoming trips in your phone’s calendar
- Check the next departures for your lines in real-time and all the timetable information
- View maps of public transport networks (accessible even offline)
- Follow pedestrian routes for walking segment

Stay informed and anticipate disruptions:

- Check your lines’ Twitter feed for real-time traffic updates
- Get alerts for disruptions on your favorite lines and routes
- Stay updated on the status of elevators in the stations you use

Customize your travel:

- Save your destinations (work, home, gym, etc.), stations, and stops as favorites
- Customize your profile (fast walker, with difficulties, reduced mobility, etc.)
- Select lines or stations to avoid

Prefer soft or alternative modes of transport:

- Book car-sharing and/or ride-sharing trips in partnership with leading providers
- Opt for bicycle routes for all your trips
- Rent a car or a van for a short period by choosing a Communauto car-sharing vehicle from a wide selection of stations around you and book it immediately for the duration of your choice.
--
Already using the Île-de-France Mobilités app and enjoying its services? Let us know with a 5-star rating!
Experiencing bugs or having feedback to give? Help us improve by sending your suggestions through the contact form available via the personal space.

Turn your device into a GPS speedometer and intelligent trip companion. Whether driving, cycling, boating, or exploring on foot, track every detail of your journey with style.

SPEED & NAVIGATION:
- GPS speed tracking in MPH, KM/H, or knots
- Real-time trip computer: speed, distance, altitude, heading, duration
- Live position tracking with interactive map view
- Trip recording with detailed route mapping
- Save and review your journeys anytime

SMART DISPLAY MODES:
Heads-Up Display (HUD):
- Mirror your speed onto the windshield
- Display vital stats while driving
- Suitable for nighttime use with auto-brightness adjustment

Picture in Picture Mode (PRO):
- Floating speedometer overlay works with any app
- Monitor your speed while using navigation or music apps
- Fully resizable and repositionable window

INTELLIGENT ALERTS:
Speed Limit Detection (PRO):
- Automatic speed limit recognition for your current road
- Smart alerts when approaching or exceeding limits
- Global coverage with intelligent road inference
- Customizable warning thresholds and notification sounds

Performance Tracking:
- G-Force acceleration and braking analysis
- Enhanced altitude tracking with pressure sensors  
- Moving vs. stationary time breakdowns
- Maximum and average speed calculations

ENTERTAINMENT INTEGRATION:
- Built-in Apple Music controls and display
- Current song information without app switching
- Seamless music playback during your drives

PERSONALIZATION OPTIONS:
- Multiple color themes to match your style
- Flexible unit system: KM/H, MPH, or nautical knots
- Various display layouts and orientations
- Dark mode and auto-brightness support
- Adjustable speedometer scales and ranges
- Left or right-handed speedometer positioning
- Portrait and landscape with rotation lock

PRO SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES:
- Unlimited trip recording and storage
- GPX route export for sharing and backup
- Road-based speed limit detection with alerts
- Picture in Picture floating speedometer
- Weather forecasts and current conditions
- Premium color themes and custom app icons
- Advanced performance analytics

FREE FEATURES:
- Core speedometer and basic trip computer
- Standard HUD mode
- Map view with position tracking
- Limited trip storage
- Essential customization options

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:
- Free download with core features always available
- Optional PRO subscription for premium capabilities
- Cancel anytime through App Store account settings
- Payment charged to Apple ID upon purchase confirmation
- Auto-renewal unless cancelled 24 hours before period ends
- Manage subscriptions via your App Store account

IMPORTANT REQUIREMENTS:
- GPS/Location Services required for speed tracking
- Not compatible with WiFi-only iPad models
- GPS accuracy depends on signal strength and environment
- Best performance in open areas with clear sky visibility
- Continuous GPS usage affects battery life
- Never operate device while driving - safety first!

Rate and Review:
Your feedback helps us improve and develop new features.
Share your experience on the App Store!

Welcome to Locus Map Lite for iOS, your new companion for all your outdoor adventures! Whether you're a seasoned hiker, a weekend cyclist, passionate ski mountaineer or just someone who loves exploring the great outdoors, Locus Map Lite is designed to enhance your experience by providing user-friendly mapping tools right at your fingertips.

Key features:
- GLOBAL MAPS FOR HIKING AND BIKING: No matter where you are in the world, Locus Map Lite can display your location on a detailed hiking/biking or winter/ski maps. For a true view of the landscape, there is also the satellite map. Easily navigate your surroundings and discover new trails and paths.

- POINTS OF INTERESTS: Enhance your exploration with a rich display of points of interest right on your map. Each one includes useful information, attractive landmarks are depicted on Wikipedia photos, and you can even add your photos so everybody always knows the current state of the place. From scenic overlooks to tourist attractions and facilities, Locus Map Lite helps you discover more.

- ACTIVITY RECORDING: Capture every moment of your adventures with track recording. Whether you're cycling, hiking, or enjoying a leisurely trip, Locus Map Lite keeps track of your rides, workouts, and journeys.

- GUIDANCE: Get direction to chosen location whether it is Geocache, LoPoint - point of interest from our maps, waypoint from your library or any other place on Earth manually chosen on map. Be alerted when you get there - more time to focus on the nature around you instead of the screen.

- WORKS ONLINE AND OFFLINE: Download maps together with points of interest (POIs) of the desired country or region and hit the trail without worrying about losing internet connectivity.

- SYNC ACROSS DEVICES: Seamlessly sync your data — tracks, routes, points — with other devices running Locus Map, even cross-platform, or with your web library. Your adventures are always accessible, no matter where you are or what device you use.

- LOCAL LIBRARY MANAGEMENT: Manage your tracks, routes, and points with ease. Our local library management tools allow you to sort, move, and delete your data, making it easy to organize your outdoor activities. You can import or export any data via GPX files and also share your activities and interesting places with others.

- SEARCH WORLDWIDE: Looking for a specific place or point of interest? Our global search capability lets you find locations anywhere in the world, enhancing your planning and on-the-go decisions.

- INTEGRATION WITH APPLE HEALTH AND WATCHES: Keep track of your health and fitness goals. Locus Map Lite integrates with Apple Health so that you can download your activities from your watch to the library for in-app analysis or further planning.  

Join us in shaping the future:

Locus Map Lite is just at the beginning and your input and support are invaluable as we continue to improve and expand its capabilities. We invite you to join us on our journey by sharing your feedback and suggestions for the development. Help us tailor Locus Map Lite to better meet the needs of our adventurous community.

Whether you're trekking through mountains, cycling through the countryside, or exploring urban landscapes, Locus Map Lite is here to guide you every step of the way. Try it today and see where it takes you!

▷ iLocation is a tool to search and share location easily and quickly.

With iLocation, you can tell the current location or the specified location by several screen clicks. And if you want to know the coordinates or address of the current location, you can simply run iLocation.

When you want to explain an appointment, or when you need to know your current location in a hurry, you can also pin the map on top of the map and simply select the transport to share the location.

◉ Function

• Automatically display current location information when running App
• Coordinate and altitude display of current position or specified position
• Show the location's address
• Show compass bearing
• Change the map format (General, Satellite)
• Specify the center of the map and check the coordinates and addresses
• Specify coordinates by entering coordinates
• Specify an arbitrary location by entering an address (Pro)
• Save map to camera roll or clipboard
• Save your location to Favorites for reuse
• Save the specified location information and map or share it via SNS
• The location is sent to the URL so that the recipient can connect to the map immediately

If you have iLocation, you will be able to explain your location without having to talk.

◉ Notice

• This is a completely free app, so no payment or subscription is required.
• Depending on the user's location and environment, GPS signal reception may not be smooth or there may be differences in accuracy.
• This app cannot change your device's system GPS information.
• Since the content of banner ads is published by advertising agencies, we do not know or participate in the interaction between the ads and app users.
